title: Tree

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Utilize the abilities you gained as a Treestump.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Attacks you use will be attributed to the original killer, and you will appear to visit the victim as normal.
- Tree does not roll naturally. You must upgrade from the Treestump.

desc:
